item.description:
Come join us for dinner at the only Polish restaurant in Boston (at least they claim to be). Cafe Polonia offers traditional Polish and Eastern European cuisine with a cozy atmosphere similar to a country cottage in the mountain region of Poland.

Some of the items on the menu are: Famous potato dumplings, pancakes, cheese and potato with onions pierogi, stuffed cabbage, stew, beet soups ? are the favorites for every family dinner or celebration. Polish cuisine is also famous for meat dishes. Roasts, wild games, geese, pork, different kind of ham.

Many of the reviews I read recommend trying the Polish Plate from the menu.

Here's the web site: http://www.cafepoloni...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be out front of the restaurant just before 7pm with a meet up sign. If you come later, look for a meet up sign on the tables.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Cafe Polonia Polish Restaurant
